👋 Hello! Check it out...

The multi-step form from Sections Pro is an awesome way to gather form feedback from your customers in a fun way that customers love! ❤️ The form supports fun single select, multi-select, and text options. You can have one or more fields per step and as many steps as you need.

🎯 Built-in to Shopify

Our multi-step form uses the built-in Shopify contact form. So, there is no need to pay for an extra service. Equivalent multi-step form services sell for over $30 a month. 🤯

This field is required.

Success!

You can create a configurable success message when the form is submitted. This is a great way to provide additional follow-up information or coupon codes.
